member.name: IDCompositionTarget.SetRoot
member.summary: Sets a visual object as the new root object of a visual tree.
member.param: The visual object that is the new root of this visual tree. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionTarget
member.summary: Represents a binding between a Microsoft DirectComposition visual tree and a destination on top of which the visual tree should be composed.
